column3: Time to take me demiatma-imbued tools and direct the isle's aether into somethin' truly majestic!
A sight o' the likes you've never seen before, eh? A shimmerin', shiftin', multi-layered mesh of aether made malleable, channeled with expert precision...
Behold the pinnacle o' weapon fabrication: <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203>!
Behold the pinnacle o' weapon an' shield fabrication: <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203> an' <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E803020203>!
To marvel at its glory is all well an' good, but the power within's naught but an illusory whisper─a fleetin' phantom, if ye will─until it's awoken in the throes o' battle.
All of which is to say, get out there an' wield the bleedin' thing!
